long_description: The Petzl Mambo 10.1 x 60mm Non-Dry Rope has a 10.1 mm diameter for greater versatility and ease of use in the gym or at the crag. Its thick sheath improves durability and control. 10.1mm diameter is ideal for use at the gym or the crag; thick sheath provides excellent abrasion resistance. Core and sheath are bonded together at the rope ends by an ultrasonic process to give greater durability and avoid frayed ends. Special EverFlex thermal treatment stabilizes the core strands and improves consistency; offers excellent grip and consistent handling over time. Middle of the rope is marked to facilitate setting up rappels. ClimbReady coil allows the rope to be used right out of the package; butterfly coil prevents tangles and kinking, just tie-in and start climbing. Kernmantle design features a stretchy core protected by a durable outer sheath which combine for strength and good handling. Petzl Mambo 10.1 x 60mm Non-Dry Rope meets or exceeds UIAA tests for falls, impact force and elongation.
short_description: The Petzl Mambo 10.1 x 60mm Non-Dry Rope has a 10.1 mm diameter for greater versatility and ease of use in the gym or at the crag. Its thick sheath improves durability and control.
